duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide medical leadership for the hospital and manage associate veterinarians.
Assure regulatory compliance relating to the practice of veterinary medicine.
Create an environment of teamwork, quality medicine, and exceptional client service.
Responsible for the financial performance and general operations of the hospital.
Cultivate a supportive and collaborative team environment.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) degree from an accredited university. Licensure in good standing to practice in the state of Tennessee.
